root.name: cross()

example.code: v1 = PVector(10, 20, 2) v2 = PVector(60, 80, 6) v3 = v1.cross(v2) println(v3)# Prints "[ -40.0, 60.0, -400.0 ]"

root.description: Calculates and returns a vector composed of the cross product between two vectors.

parameter.label: v
parameter.description: PVector: the vector to calculate the cross product

parameter.label: v
parameter.description: PVector: any variable of type PVector

parameter.label: target
parameter.description: PVector: PVector to store the result

parameter.label: v1
parameter.description: PVector: any variable of type PVector

parameter.label: v2
parameter.description: PVector: any variable of type PVector

parameter.label: target
parameter.description: PVector: PVector to store the result
